actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: Joint resolution to prohibit the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development from making any grant to any urban county, except grants for hold harmless amounts, under title I of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 until July 1, 1975, so that Congress may have time to reexamine the method for allocating funds for grants under such title.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development from making any grant to any urban county, except grants for hold harmless amounts, under title I of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 until July 1, 1975, so that Congress may have time to reexamine the method for allocating funds for grants under such title.

titles.title: Joint resolution to prohibit the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development from making any grant to any urban county, except grants for hold harmless amounts, under title I of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 until July 1, 1975, so that Congress may have time to reexamine the method for allocating funds for grants under such title.
